00005 unsigned char syscallProcessValid(unsigned int pid)
00006 {
00007         //Iterate untill found the correct PID
00008         process_t* iterator = 0;
00009         unsigned int number = 0;
00010 
00011         for (;;)
00012         {
00013                 iterator = schedulerReturnProcess(number);
00014 
00015                 if (iterator == 0) return 0;
00016                 if (iterator->m_ID == pid) break;
00017 
00018                 number = number + 1;
00019         }
00020 
00021         return 1;
00022 }

00024 int syscallGetPid(unsigned int iter)
00025 {
00026         if (schedulerReturnProcess(iter) == 0) return -1;
00027         return schedulerReturnProcess(iter)->m_ID;
00028 }

00051 void syscallGetName(char* StrLocation, unsigned int pid)
00052 {       
00053         //Iterate untill found the correct PID
00054         process_t* iterator = 0;
00055         unsigned int number = 0;
00056 
00057         for (;;)
00058         {
00059                 iterator = schedulerReturnProcess(number);
00060 
00061                 if (iterator == 0)
00062                 {
00063                         strcpy(StrLocation, "Unknown");
00064                         return;
00065                 }
00066                 if (iterator->m_ID == pid) break;
00067 
00068                 number = number + 1;
00069         }
00070 
00071         //Copy the name into the StrLocation
00072         strcpy(StrLocation, iterator->m_Name);
00073 }

00075 void syscallKillCurrentProcess()
00076 {
00077         schedulerKillCurrentProcess();

00080 void syscallRequestExit(int returnValue)
00081 {
00082         getCurrentProcess()->m_returnValue = returnValue;
00083         schedulerKillCurrentProcess();
